metadata.title: CVE-2015-3629 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Libcontainer 1.6.0, as used in Docker Engine, allows local users to escapecontainerization ("mount namespace breakout") and write to arbitrary fileon the host system via a symlink attack in an image when respawning acontainer.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3629` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

docker.io - 1.6.2~dfsg1-1ubuntu4~14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: docker.io package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.2~dfsg1-1ubuntu4~14.04.1').
